lines.text: [Rudolf is drinking coffee in the unattended candy stall when a couple of african american basketball players enter]
Take it easy, all we want is coffee.
And, I'll have one of those... bye the way, what do you call, those?
[Pointing at a pile of chocolate balls]
We call them ni -... nigg... no, no, no, no... we call them wienerbröd, wiener brudds.

[while going to the travel agency]
But Magica has her hands on Scrooge's first dime. And Donald and his nephews are trapped in a cave. I've got to help'em!
We are not going to Duckburg.

[talking about girls]
If they only get something shiny they melt in your hands. But I don't have to tell you that, do I? You are one of'em womaniziers?
Oh, candy! May I have some?
